data.name: Tunnels
data.description:
Prepare for a heart-pounding journey like no other in this immersive VR horror experience, where terror lurks around every corner. In "Tunnels" you step into the shoes of Jim, a seasoned demolition expert with a daunting mission: to seal an abandoned gold mine once and for all. But what begins as a routine assignment takes a sinister turn when Jim unexpectedly plummets deep into the abyss, far from the safety of the mine's entrance.
As Jim, you are alone in the subterranean abyss, armed with nothing but your wits and a fading radio connection to your trusted friend and guide, Henry. Together, you'll need to navigate the suffocating darkness of the mine's labyrinthine tunnels, all while confronting a growing sense of dread that threatens to consume you.
Claustrophobia becomes a constant companion as you navigate narrow passages and crawl through tight crevices, all while the ever-encroaching darkness threatens to overwhelm you.
Are you ready to face the abyss and conquer your deepest fears? "Tunnels" beckons, promising an unforgettable VR experience that will haunt you long after you leave the mine. Can you escape the suffocating darkness, or will you become just another lost soul in the depths of fear?
